title: Until You
description: To be Re-released this Summer - 2016- Follow any of my pages to stay updated.Currently being re-edited with a bit of added story line.Trina just wanted to wake up each morning and go to bed every night at peace with the tragedy that was her past. She had been through hell the last year. After losing something she never knew she had, then almost losing her life, things were finally looking up. She desperately wanted to move on.	 ****The east coast was as far away from home as Sam was going to get. He was still reeling from a losing season riddled with injuries. He was emotionally and physically exhausted. He needed to clear his head before he embarked on a summer of make believe, dress up and baby dolls.He never counted on meeting her. The beautiful blonde with the edgy look, amazing voice and hot body. Before he knew what had happened, he had fallen hard and fast for her. After only one passionate night he couldn't imagine going back to the west coast without her.The challenging part was convincing her.
author: Melody Heck Gatto
